title: Bug 21041[Update] Force welcome page first time a new feature is installed
description: Bug 21041[Update] Force welcome page first time a new feature is installed
OB: When a new feature is installed if it has a welcome.xml there is no way toforce it to show up the first time the eclipse is launched after installingthe feature.
EB: Now that the user has this new handy dandy function productswould like the user to be able to see the welcome page without having to go tothe welcome dialog.This is of course in the case of the addition of a feature with a olderworkspace not a fresh workspace.
